item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Is on Track to Break a Baldur's Gate 3 Record
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 script currently has around 2.2 million words.
  • The game is hence presently on track to break the Baldur's Gate 3 record for the longest video game script of all time.
  • Since content cuts are a common occurrence in game development, there's still a chance the Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 script could get trimmed before the RPG hits the store shelves in early 2025.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is currently on track to set a new world record for the longest video game script of all time, a senior Warhorse Studios official has said. The said record is presently held by Baldur's Gate 3 .

According to Larian Studios' own estimates, the original Baldur's Gate 3 English script has over two million words. To illustrate that figure from a different angle, the award-winning RPG has around 174 hours' worth of cutscenes—only a fraction of which can be seen in a single playthrough—and a triple-digit number of books and notes that can be found throughout its world.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Script Has Around 2.2 Million Words

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is set to one-up that astonishing figure, according to Warhorse Studios Creative Director Daniel Vavra. Taking to Twitter on August 29, Vavra revealed that the upcoming RPG's script has approximately 2.2 million words as of the developer's latest count. This is the equivalent of 25 novels or 100 two-hour movie screenplays, the industry veteran said. The Kingdom Come: Deliverance sequel is hence presently on track to seize the Guinness World Record for the longest video game script ever, which is held by Baldur's Gate 3 .

Warhorse Could Still End Up Trimming the KCD2 Script

Be that as it may, there is still a chance for the upcoming RPG to fall short of that goal, not least because last-minute content cuts are a fairly common occurrence in video game development. E.g., Larian itself decided to cut a sizable amount of Baldur's Gate 3 content in the final stretch of the project, partially because it wanted to meet deadlines and in part because the game was getting too big. Seeing how Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is still nearly half a year away from hitting the market, there is still plenty of time for parts of its current script to be left on the cutting room floor.

Regardless of whether it manages to one-up the size of the Baldur's Gate 3 script, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is guaranteed to be much bigger than its predecessor. As recently explained by Henry actor Tom McKay, the scale of the upcoming RPG will be what Warhorse intended for the first game, but wasn't able to realize its vision due to a lack of resources.

Following its mid-August 2024 delay, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is now scheduled for release on February 11, 2025. The first-person RPG will be available on the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

item.title: What to Expect from Concord's Post-Launch Support
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Concord's player base is dwindling, especially on PC, raising concerns about its long-term viability.
  • Still, developer Firewalk Studios has ambitious plans for the next five months of post-launch content.
  • Though Concord may struggle to survive like other games with a similar focus on post-launch support, it is good to know that plans are in place for the game - at least for the near future.

Pioneered by MMOs like World of Warcraft , and then thrust into the mainstream by games like Fortnite , PUBG , and Call of Duty: Warzone , the live-service model continues to be one of the shakiest double-edged swords in gaming. While a successful live-service model can keep a game alive and monetized for years, a failed live-service approach can result in a game's abrupt shutdown. Unfortunately, it doesn't seem like Concord is part of the former camp.

Released only a week ago, Concord 's player-base has already hit dire lows on PC, and though its performance on PlayStation is unclear, its success probably won't be enough regardless to offset the player shortage on PC. But despite its initial reception, Concord 's developer Firewalk Studios has already confirmed the next five months of the hero shooter's post-launch plans, and they're rather ambitious.

Everything Confirmed For Concord's Post-Launch Seasons So Far

Everything Announced for Concord Season 1

  • New Freegunner
  • New map
  • New Variants
  • New vignettes
  • New cosmetics and rewards
  • Quality of life updates

Set to hit the hero shooter in October of this year, Concord Season 1 is going to bring a ton of new content to the game. The most exciting new addition of this season will undoubtedly be a new playable Freegunner. Though Concord 's 16-strong roster is fairly diverse, its hero count does pale in comparison to some of its competition, and it could definitely use more distinct Freegunners to better stand out from the crowd. A new map will also be a welcome addition in October, as will some new cinematic vignettes that presumably flesh out the Sci-Fi world of Concord a bit more.

Everything Announced for Concord Season 2

  • New Freegunner
  • New mode
  • New map
  • New Variants
  • New vignettes
  • New cosmetics and rewards
  • Quality of life updates

Set to begin in January 2025, Concord Season 2 is going to add even more fresh content to Firewalk's hero shooter. Along with another new playable Freegunner, another new map, some more cinematic vignettes, and everything else listed above, Concord 's second season is set to add a new mode to the game. Though Concord already has six enjoyable game modes spread across its three distinct playlists, it would be great to see some more team-based modes in Concord.

Will Concord's Post-Launch Plans Come to Fruition?

While it's great to see Firewalk already confirm the next five months of Concord 's post-launch support, there's a lot of speculation right now around whether Concord can even survive that long. According to SteamDB, at the time of writing, Concord has just 162 active players on Steam. It wouldn't make a whole lot of sense for Firewalk and Sony to keep supporting Concord if these numbers only continue to get worse in the coming weeks.

Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is the perfect example of this post-launch dedication not panning out how intended. Suicide Squad has released two seasons of new content over the last few months that have failed to bring in new players, or retain the player-base. At the time of writing, Suicide Squad has just 115 active players on Steam. The only way Concord 's post-launch plans will be worth delivering is if the game can build a larger player-base, and the only way to do that is with some drastic changes.

item.title: Vampire Survivors - Launch Trailer
item.description: Mow down thousands of night creatures and survive until dawn! Vampire Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against the hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong— How To Get All Pieces Of Sun Wukong's Armor (Best Armor)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where To Find All Four Pieces Of Sun Wukong's Armor In Black Myth: Wukong
  • Where To Find Gold Armored Rhino In Black Myth: Wukong
  • Where To Find Cloudtreading Deer In Black Myth: Wukong
  • Where To Find Feng-Tail General In Black Myth: Wukong
  • Where To Find The Emerald-Armed Mantis In Black Myth: Wukong

Black Myth: Wukong has a ton of different bosses, and fighting them without the proper equipment is rather unwise as it could lead to multiple attempts and prolonged battles. Therefore, it is absolutely necessary to find and craft the best armor in the game.

With every passing chapter, the difficulty increases, meaning the enemies become tougher to beat. As Chapter 6 is the final one, it makes sense for the bosses to be much stronger. However, Black Myth: Wukong players can get a major boost if they manage to collect all four pieces of Sun Wukong's armor .

Where To Find All Four Pieces Of Sun Wukong's Armor In Black Myth: Wukong

It Is Necessary To Beat All Four Bosses

In order to obtain all the pieces, players will need to fight and beat four bosses on Mount Huaguo . These are:

  • Gold Armored Rhino
  • Cloudtreading Deer
  • Feng-Tail General
  • Emerald Armed Mantis

Where To Find Gold Armored Rhino In Black Myth: Wukong

The Gold Armored Rhino can be found near a battlefield that is covered by multiple bodies. Players should be able to locate it easily once they climb onto the cloud and gain altitude. The Gold Armored Rhino's horn must be broken; otherwise, it will hardly take any damage. Once beaten, it will drop the Gold Suozi Armor .

Where To Find Cloudtreading Deer In Black Myth: Wukong

The Cloudtreading Deer is not far from the area where players encounter the Gold Armored Rhino. Hop onto the cloud and keep ascending until you see an area with a big tree with red leaves. Approach this fight carefully, as the Cloudtreading Deer can use many powerful attacks and end the fight in seconds. Defeating this enemy will give you Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders .

Where To Find Feng-Tail General In Black Myth: Wukong

The Feng-Tail General has no fixed location, so it might take a few minutes for the players to track it down. After tracking it down, players need to grab its antennae to bring it down. The first sequence will drain their stamina, and the subsequent one will be a test of their health. After taming it, players will receive the Golden Feng-Tail Crown .

The Feng-Tail General has a set pattern. After players figure it out, they can find the enemy at the same spot.

Where To Find The Emerald-Armed Mantis In Black Myth: Wukong

The Emerald-Armed Mantis will not appear until you have beaten the Feng-Tail General. The battle will take place inside Zhu Bajie, and it will be against a bloodthirsty mantis. Players can find the mantis near the golden tree in the middle of the water body. There will be a Keeper's Shrine nearby, so make sure to activate it. Be careful while fighting the Mantis, as it becomes more violent as the fight drags on. After conquering this foe, players will receive Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers .

item.title: Monopoly GO: Free Dice Roll Links (Updated Daily)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Free Monopoly GO Dice Links for Today
  • Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links
  • How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO
  • How to Get Free Dice Rolls in Monopoly Go

Monopoly GO is a fun board game that combines the classic Monopoly experience with cool additional features and a city-building element. In the game, players can move their pieces to earn money and then use that money to build new buildings, upgrade their houses, and much more. The ultimate goal is to drive other players into bankruptcy by acquiring all pieces of property, essentially creating a “monopoly.”

In Monopoly GO , players move according to the roll of dice they get, and the game proceeds with renting, trading, and buying properties. If players have finished their dice rolls and want to get some more, here’s how they can do it.

Updated by Umama Ali on August 29, 2024: Dice links are a quick and easy way to get free dice rolls in Monopoly GO . To help you score free dice, we’ve updated this guide to include the most recent and active links. Remember, dice links have expiration dates, so make sure to redeem them quickly before they disappear.

Free Monopoly GO Dice Links for Today

While your dice rolls slowly replenish over time, you can use Dice Links to get free dice rolls instantly. Dice Links are a quick and easy way to grab free dice and keep the action going in Monopoly GO .

Here are all the active Monopoly GO Dice Links for August 2024 to help you participate in ongoing events and tournaments and complete boards easily.

Dice Links

Date

25 x Dice Rolls

Aug 26 - Sep 02

25 x Dice Rolls

Aug 29- Sep 02

25 x Dice Rolls

Aug 27 - Aug 30

25 x Dice Rolls

Aug 28 - Aug 31

Dice links can only be redeemed once per account . Additionally, links expire after a certain amount of time. If you click a link, and it says "This reward cannot be claimed", then that particular link is no longer valid.

Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links

  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls

How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO

To redeem these links, tycoons can follow these simple steps:

  • Open a link on your phone. This will launch the Monopoly GO app on your device.
  • All you need to do then is click 'Collect,' and you'll get dice rolls for free.

How to Get Free Dice Rolls in Monopoly Go

Login Daily

Like most mobile games nowadays, Monopoly GO also offers incentives for players so that they frequently play the game. One of the daily treats is free dice rolls, so logging in daily is one way to get them. In addition to dice rolls, players have the chance to win other exciting prizes as well.

Invite Friends

Monopoly GO offers generous rewards for players who successfully invite others to join the game. If a player invites a friend, and the invited friend joins the game, both of them get 30 extra rolls . Players can keep getting 30 free rolls for inviting up to 30 friends , given that they accept the invitation.

Collect Community Chest Rewards

Community chests are great because they offer a variety of rewards. Players can open these chests to earn money, and if they help a friend with a community chest, they can earn some free rolls.

To make the most out of the community chest, players must ensure that they have at least 9 active in-game friends.

Complete Sticker Albums

Players collect stickers throughout Monopoly GO , and they aren’t just a fun part of the game; they can help players get dice rolls , too. For every sticker set or album that players complete, they receive dice rolls. While the free rolls earned through sticker albums are more than those obtained after completing a set, the process of completing an album can be more time-consuming.

Participate in Events and Tournaments

If you want a bunch of dice rolls, consider participating in events and tournaments. The game introduces new events regularly, and by completing their milestones, you can claim dice rolls, different sticker packs, in-game money, and various other exciting prizes . Tournaments also pack a lot of stellar rewards, so players should aim to secure a high position on the tournament leaderboard to make the most of them.

Special Events

Apart from the main events and tournaments, Monopoly GO also has a number of special events. From Free Parking to Wheel Boost, the game offers many events to help you grab some dice rolls. However, their timings change every day, so you can check out our daily events schedule guide to know when they happen.
